isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - 5 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS SPICER ES60-5 - REASSEMBLE - SHIFT TOWER

step1.para: Position the lever housing on edge in a vise.
Hold the shift lever so that the lever cross hole aligns with the rock shaft cross hole in the lever housing.
Insert the rock shaft pin through the holes in the lever housing and shift lever.
Assemble the rock shaft snap ring to the groove of the lever housing, locking the rock shaft in place.
Next, place a new, lightly greased seal on the lever housing. Grease the inner wall of the cup, and slide it over the lever into position on the lever housing.
Assemble the spring, spring retainer, and lever cover over the shift lever. Depress the spring retainer and insert the spring retainer lock pin through the hole in the lever.
Place the shift lever and lever housing assembly on the shifter housing with a gasket, noting that the finger enters the neutral position notches.
Secure the assembly with the bolts and lockwashers. Tighten to 25 to 41 ft-lbs. (34-56 N•m).
